item.title: Static Sites with Python, uv, Caddy, and Docker
item.description: Static Sites with Python, uv, Caddy, and Docker Nik Kantar documents his Docker-based setup for building and deploying mostly static web sites in line-by-line detail. item.description: This post is a more technical follow-up to the post announcing the passing of SB 260 in Utah, establishing the principles for state-endorsed digital identity (SEDI).
